title: Lag
body: Guys.... I have soo much lag with this new client update beta .. Why ?

replies.body: Can you provide more details what you're specifically experiencing? *Lag* is commonly used as a catch-all term that could mean many different things.

It went perfectly League Of Legends before. Do not block at all. Yesterday when I made updates to the beta (new client) it started to work very hard. In teamfight reach 10 fps, moves me very hard. I can not do nothing matches ... Why?

It's possible that the client is taking a bit more system resources than it did when you were running the Legacy Client. I'd like you to run all available Windows updates, then [complete a clean boot](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting#wq3) to remove as many background apps as possible from starting with your PC.

Let me know if this caused any change.
Audio lags every time someone select a champion. Animations lag from time to time. Those are my biggest ones.

It went perfectly League Of Legends before. Do not block at all. Yesterday when I made updates to the beta (new client) it started to work very hard. In teamfight reach 10 fps, moves me very hard. I can not do nothing matches ... Why?
